s2: The second season with an awesome spawn hub.

featInfo: Each season we carefully select plugins and functions, to keep your builds safe and bring a little varierty to survival
features: Access to gamemode and time commands
Access to full World Edit commands
Schematic Manager, for easy upload/download of schematics
Warp system to book mark builds
startInfo: Connecting to the network and switching servers is fairly straight forward. Connect to the network using:
If this is your first time logging in you will default to the survival server. To switch to the other servers, use the following commands:

general: /warp - Takes you to the warp location
/statue create - creates a staue of the playername
